title: HELPPPP
body: why can't i add bots for custom games?? someone please help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

The ability to add bots to a custom game currently doesnt exist in the new client, I'm not sure if it is on the roadmap either.

Your best bet would be to launch the legacy client, easily accomplished by clicking "Launch legacy client" from the new launcher (Bottom Right).

http://puu.sh/sfwxM/224748b266.jpg
